mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bd_srch_info WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND report_stats = '1' ORDER BY report_no ASC, report_cre_dt DESC
SELECT report_no, business_nm FROM bd_srch_info WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND report_stats = '2' ORDER BY report_no ASC, report_cre_dt DESC

choose.when: SELECT a.*, (SELECT attch_file_nm FROM bd_attch_file_info WHERE attch_file_kind ='2' AND a.report_no = report_no) AS img_attch_file_nm, (SELECT attch_file_nm FROM bd_attch_file_info WHERE attch_file_kind ='1' AND a.report_no = report_no) AS audio_attch_file_nm FROM bd_srch_info a, bd_attch_file_info b WHERE a.report_no = #{report_no} AND a.user_id = b.user_id AND a.report_no = b.report_no GROUP BY a.report_no

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bd_srch_info( report_no, user_id, business_nm, object_place_nm, object_relation_user, object_relation_user_home_tel, object_relation_user_mobil_tel, object_location, object_use, object_buil_struc, check_period_start, check_period_end, check_user_nm, check_user_qualfication_class, check_user_qualfication_no, submit_dt, head_fire_depart, location_lat, location_lon, report_cre_dt, report_stats) VALUES( #{report_no}, #{user_id}, #{business_nm}, #{object_place_nm}, #{object_relation_user}, #{object_relation_user_home_tel}, #{object_relation_user_mobil_tel}, #{object_location}, #{object_use}, #{object_buil_struc}, #{check_period_start}, #{check_period_end}, #{check_user_nm}, #{check_user_qualfication_class}, #{check_user_qualfication_no}, #{submit_dt}, #{head_fire_depart}, #{location_lat}, #{location_lon}, NOW(), default)
